questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
no The old man is wearing a T-shirt covered in paint, not a fabric smock.
yes There is indeed a young man wearing wooden goggles and an oversized T-shirt.
yes The image shows an old man in a paint-covered T-shirt next to a young man in an oversized T-shirt and wooden goggles, creating a comparison.
no The old man is wearing a T-shirt, not a smock.
yes The goggles on the young man appear to be made of wood.
